info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-hsr-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for ( High-Availability Seamless Redundancy ) HSR operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** MPLS & TE
**Paths:** 25

id.description: Unique ID of the HSR Ring

state.description: Current state of the HSR Ring

op-mode.description: Operational mode of the HSR Ring

max-ports.description: Maximum possible number of ports in a Ring

node-forget-time.description:
Time interval after which the node
         will be forgotten

node-reboot-time.description:
Time interval after which the node
         will be reboot

entry-forget-time.description:
Time interval after which the entry
         will be forgotten

proxy-node-forget-time.description:
Time interval after which the node
         will be forgotten

supframe-cos-opt.description:
Class of Service (COS) option to be set
         in the VLAN tag of the Supervision frame

supframe-cfi-opt.description:
Canonical Format Indicator (CFI)
         for Vlan Tagged Supervision frame

supframe-mac-da.description:
Last octet of Supervision frame
         Destination MAC address

supframe-vlan-id.description: VLAN ID of the Supervision frame

supframe-time.description:
Time interval between two supervision
         frames being sent

life-check-interval.description: life check interval time value for supervision frames

is-uplink-fpga-enbl.description:
Field Programmable Gate Array dual
         uplink enhancement is enabled/disabled
